title: 7.10 patch issue
body: hi riot i try to log in league of legend today. it was worked yesterday but it's not working today i don't understand. and i searched about this problem and they said it's because of 7.10 patched issue. i can log in league of legend website but i can't log in client. they saying "unable to connect to the log in queue. check the server statue" that what they said after when i try to log in even i put right username and password can you guys please finxed this problem for me and all user in oce server. and

replies.body: It looks like we were having some login issues around the time that you posted this. They should be cleared up by now, but definitely hit me back up if you still can't get logged in.
